Who can start braces?

Orthodontics isn't just for teenagers. We customise protocols for all ages.

Age 7â€“11

Interceptive Phase

Early screening lets us guide jaw growth, expand arches and make room for permanent teeth. Best time to correct habits like thumb sucking.

Age 12â€“17

Growth Spurt Advantage

The pubertal growth spurt is the golden window to correct skeletal imbalances with functional appliances, often avoiding future surgery.

Adults 18+

Adult Orthodontics

We coordinate periodontal care, restorative dentistry and braces to align teeth safely at any age using invisible ceramic options.

Understanding your Bite

Common issues we correct daily.

Crowding

Teeth jostle for space. We expand arches to align them without extraction.

Spacing

Gaps between teeth. We close them to improve smile esthetics and gum health.

Deep Bite

Upper teeth cover lower teeth too much. We open the bite to protect enamel.

Open Bite

Front teeth don't touch. We correct tongue posture and alignment.

Crossbite

Upper teeth bite inside lower teeth. Early correction prevents uneven jaw growth.

Protrusion

Upper teeth stick out. We retract them to reduce injury risk and improve profile.

Digital Diagnostics

Digital diagnostics remove guesswork. We map teeth, jaw joints, airway and smile dynamics before the first bracket is bonded.

Records & Scans

Full mouth X-rays, cephalograms, and iTero 3D scans build your baseline dataset.

Mock Analysis

We simulate tooth movement digitally and evaluate airway harmony.

3D Simulation

See your finished smile on video before we even start.

SCANNING: 100%AI ANALYSIS: READY

The Clinical Roadmap

Bonding Day

Month 0

Protective sealant applied. Brackets placed digitally first, then transferred to teeth.

Leveling Phase

Month 1-6

Super-elastic NiTi wires unwind, gently pulling teeth into the arch form. Space creation.

Bite Correction

Month 7-14

Heavy steel wires & elastics fix overbite/underbite for perfect jaw mesh. Functional appliances if needed.

Detailing

Month 15-20

Finishing bends, smile arc design, root paralleling and settling elastics for the perfect lock.

Retention

Lifetime

Debonding followed by Fixed Wire + Clear Tray (Essix) retainers to ensure zero relapse.

Month 0

Bonding Day

Protective sealant applied. Brackets placed digitally first, then transferred to teeth.

Life with Braces

Protecting your appliances is key to finishing on time. Broken brackets can add 1-2 months to your treatment time.

Sticky Foods
Caramel, Gum
Hard Foods
Nuts, Ice, Popcorn
Crunchy Veg
Raw Carrots (Cut them!)
Chewy Bread
Bagels, Pizza Crust

High Risk

Shear force from these foods will snap the adhesive instantly.

Retention: Insurance for your Smile

Fixed Lingual

A slim wire bonded behind front teeth. Invisible, permanent and perfect for long-term stability.

Essix Clear Tray

Clear trays worn nightly. We provide 2 sets and refresh them yearly.

Vivera Retainers

For grinders or aligner transitions. 3D printed and shipped in sets of three.
